name: Delay Bedtime
description:
You are a toddler and bedtime is at 8pm!  You can distract the adults by unleashing mayhem.

This was created for Ludum Dare 50.  The them was Delay the inevitable.

Tips:
The adults see in a straight line which is blocked by walls.  Don't make a mess when they can see you.

You can't rewind the clock past a certain time, otherwise the adults will figure out what your doing.

You can create a partial mess and finish it off later when you need to.
